dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form

Class SWTGroupController

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.AbstractWidgetController
      • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.AbstractMementoWidgetController
        • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.SWTGroupController

  • public class SWTGroupController
extends AbstractMementoWidgetController
    This is the controller implementation for the SWTGroup GUI widget. Example: 
     factory.createGroup(parentComposite,
                     "WIDGET_GROUP_ID",
                     WidgetFactory.GROUP_TITLE,
                     WidgetFactory.GROUP_LAYOUT_VERTICAL,
                     "My Group Title");

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2009.a

      • doCanShowMemento

        public boolean doCanShowMemento(java.lang.String mementoPath)
        Checks if this controller is responsible for the given mementoId.

        Groups cannot be navigated to via memento.

        Overrides:
        doCanShowMemento in class AbstractMementoWidgetController
        Parameters:
        mementoPath - path to the memento to check (memento must exist)
        Returns:
        false
        Since:
        2009.a

      • getWidgetMemento

        protected Memento getWidgetMemento()
        Query the memento that is the toplevel memento of the widget eventually creating it.

        If the controller is not registered to a factory this method returns null

        Overrides:
        getWidgetMemento in class AbstractMementoWidgetController
        Returns:
        The memento or null in case of an error
        Since:
        2009.a
